dt: {bc}full of or characterized by that quality which appeals to a sense of the {d_link|ludicrous|ludicrous} or absurdly incongruous {bc}full of or characterized by {d_link|humor|humor:1} {bc}{sx|funny||}
{bc}possessing, indicating, or expressive of an ability to be funny or to be amused by things that are funny {bc}possessing, indicating, or expressive of a sense of {a_link|humor}

dt.t: studied his own life … with a shrewd and {wi}humorous{/wi} eye

pt: {sc}witty{/sc} {sc}humorous{/sc} {sc}facetious{/sc} {sc}jocular{/sc} {sc}jocose{/sc} mean provoking or intended to provoke laughter. {sc}witty{/sc} suggests cleverness and quickness of mind.
{sc}humorous{/sc} applies broadly to anything that evokes usually genial laughter and may contrast with {it}witty{/it} in suggesting whimsicality or eccentricity.
{sc}facetious{/sc} stresses a desire to produce laughter and may be derogatory in implying dubious or ill-timed attempts at wit or humor.
{sc}jocular{/sc} implies a usually habitual fondness for jesting and joking.
{sc}jocose{/sc} is somewhat less derogatory than {sc}facetious{/sc} in suggesting habitual waggishness or playfulness.

shortdef: full of or characterized by that quality which appeals to a sense of the ludicrous or absurdly incongruous : full of or characterized by humor : funny
possessing, indicating, or expressive of an ability to be funny or to be amused by things that are funny : possessing, indicating, or expressive of a sense of humor
